name: Ground Pounders
blurb: A hex-based sci-fi strategy game featuring the tanks, air craft and infantry of the Sword of the Stars universe.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your support! Every supporter at this level and above will receive access to the password-protected Backers Only forums for Ground Pounders, campaign updates, and access to Backers Only wallpapers and art.
EARLY BIRD PRICE! Early supporters of our campaign can grab their download copy of Ground Pounders upon release at a special price. Thank you for your support!
LISTING IN GAME CREDITS. All Supporters at this level and above will be able to download a copy of the game upon release and will have the option of being listed officially in the game's credits.

BUDDY PACK! Download TWO copies of Ground Pounders for one low price on release! Instant multi-player fun for you and a lucky friend. Plus a listing in the game's credits, and access to the Backer's Only forum!
DIGITAL BUNDLE. You will get a download copy of Ground Pounders on release day, listing in the game's credits, plus a Digital Bundle of Wallpapers and art.

BETA ACCESS. Supporters at this level and above will get immediate access to the Backers-Only Beta of the game beginning in October 2013 and access to the closed Backers-Only Beta forum, in addition to the Digital Bundle, listing in the game's Credits, and a downloadable copy of the game upon release.

Beta Plus Dice! Backers at this level and above will receive a complimentary set of special decorative Sword of the Stars dice! Each set contains six beautiful six-sided dice, with emblems representing the six major empires of the Sword of the Stars universe in the years 2408-2508.

CHALLENGE COIN. Supporters at this level will receive Beta Access plus the official Ground Pounders Challenge Coin! This beautiful collectible coin is a replica of the Sol Force challenge coins which are issued to survivors of each successful Ground Forces campaign.

The Sword of the Stars Premium Lore Book! One of the most popular reward levels for a previous campaign was the MONSTER Premium Lore Book. This limited edition hardback is a compendium of over 300 pages of art and fiction for the Sotsverse, including tons of never-released concept art and team interviews with the creators of the Sword of the Stars franchise from 2004-2013. Personally signed by the creators!

STICK PACK.Supporters at this level will receive Beta Acess, the official Challenge Coin, and a Special Edition 16-gigabyte USB drive, which will arrive with the contents of your Digital Bundle loaded onto it, as well as a few extra surprise goodies from the team at Kerberos Productions.
COMBO PACK. This reward level includes Beta Access, the Premium Lore Book, the physical items of the Stick Pack, and our SotS Dice.

GAMBLER'S PACK. Supporters at this level will receive Beta Access, the official Challenge Coin, the Special Edition 16GB USB drive, a printed deck of Ground Pounders Playing Cards, and a set of collectible Sol Force dog tags!

BARRACK'S PACK. Supporters at this level will receive Beta Access, the official Challenge Coin, the Special Edition 16GB USB drive, TWO printed decks of Ground Pounders Playing Cards, a set of Sol Force dog-tags, a Ground Forces t-shirt, AND an official replica of the stainless steel Hydration Bottle carried by Ground Forces soldiers in the field!

DESIGN A CARD! Supporters at this level will be able to Design a Unique Combat Card to be added to the final game! Work with the Design Team for Ground Pounders and receive professional design credit for your contribution. This reward comes with the Beta Access package and the Physical Items of the Barracks Pack. (PLEASE NOTE: Kerberos Productions reserves the right to veto any Card Design which violates its policies on hate speech, harassment, or age-inappropriate content.)

DESIGN A UNIT!  Backers at this level will be able to Design a Unique Combat Unit to be added to the final game! Work with the Design Team for Ground Pounders and receive professional credit for your contribution. This reward comes with the Beta Access package, but no physical perks. If you wish to add the items from the Barracks Pack, Gambler's Pack, Stick Pack or Challenge Coin at this level, please add the price of the Pack to your Pledge. (PLEASE NOTE: Kerberos Productions reserves the right to veto any Unit Design which violates its policies on hate speech, harassment, or age-inappropriate content.)

DESIGN A BATTLE! Pick your favorite historical battle and work with the Ground Pounders design team to create a canonical planetary battle of the Hiver War era!  Receive professional credit for your contribution to the game and to the Sword of the Stars universe. This reward comes with the Beta Access package and all of the Physical Perks for the campaign, including the Barrack's Pack and copy of the Lore Book. (PLEASE NOTE: Kerberos Productions reserves the right to veto any Card Battle Design which violates its policies on hate speech, harassment, or age-inappropriate content.)

TRUE BELIEVER. Backers at this level will receive TWO Ground Forces t-shirts and a special VIP card, personalized with your name. \r\nHolders of the Kerberos VIP card will be granted insider-only access to games in development and free entry to any Kerberos public event, including those that would normally be Press Only. They will also have the right to cast a vote when choosing the company's next project. (PLEASE NOTE: This reward comes with no additional physical perks. If you wish to add the items from the Barracks Pack, Gambler's Pack, Stick Pack or Challenge Coin at this level, please add the price of the Pack and any additional Shipping to your Pledge.)
THE OUYA LEVEL! Just in case someone wants to OUYA us! :) We hear there's a lot of that going around! Is OUYA a verb?
